Header.title: InfinityEdge
Header.paragraph: Compete weekly. Win prizes. Earn glory.

About.paragraph: Infinityedge is a new private organization focused on Teamfight Tactics. We create tournaments and content on a regular basis. To stay updated on everything we're up to, follow us on social media.
